Verses: 1 sagodharare, Pidhaakkale, Naan Ippozhudhu Ungalukkuch Sollappogira Niyaayangalukkuch Sevikoduppeergalaaga Endraan.
2 avan Ebireyubaashaiyile Thangaludane Pesugiradhai Avargal Kettapozhudhu, Adhiga Amaidhalaayirundhaargal. Appozhudhu Avan:

3 naan Yoodhan, Silisiyaa Naattilulla Tharsupattanaththile Pirandhu, Indha Nagaraththile Gamaaliyelin Paadhaththaruge Valarndhu, Munnorgaludaiya Vedhappiramaanaththinpadiye Thittamaaip Podhikkappattu, Indraiyathdhinam Neengalellaarum Dthevanaikkuriththu Vairaakkiyamullavargalaayirukkiradhupola Naanum Vairaakkiyamullavanaayirundhen.
4 naan Indha Maarkkaththaaraagiya Purusharaiyum Sthireegalaiyum Katti, Siraichchaalaigalil Oppuviththu, Maranabariyandham Thunbappaduththinen.

5 adharkup Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Mooppar Yaavarum Saatchikoduppaargal; Avargal Kaiyile Naan Sagodhararukku Nirubangalai Vaangikkondu, Thamaskuvilirukkiravargalum Thandikkappadumpadikku, Avargalaik Katti, Erusalemukkuk Konduvarumpadi Avvidaththirkupponen.
6 appadi Naan Pirayanappattuth Thamaskuvukkuch Sameebamaanabodhu, Maththiyaana Velaiyile, Sadidhiyaai Vaanaththilirundhu Peroli Undaagi, Ennaichsutrip Piragaasiththadhu.
7 naan Tharaiyile Vizhundhen. Appozhudhu: Savule, Savule, Nee Ennai En Thunbappaduththugiraai Endru Ennudane Sollugira Oru Saththaththaik Ketten.
8 adharku Naan: Aandavare, Neer Yaar Endren. Avar: Nee Thunbappaduththugira Nasareyanaagiya Yesu Naane Endraar.
9 ennudanekooda Irundhavargal Velichchaththaikkandu, Bayamadaindhaargal; Ennudane Pesinavarudaiya Saththaththaiyo Avargal Ketkavillai.
10 appozhudhu Naan: Aandavare, Naan Ennaseyyavendum Endren. Adharkuk Karththar: Nee Ezhundhu, Thamaskuvukkup Po; Nee Seyyumpadi Niyamikkappattadhellaam Ange Unakkuch Sollappadum Endraar.
11 andha Oliyin Magimaiyinaale Naan Paarvaiyatrupponapadiyinaal, Ennodirundhavargalaal Kailaagu Koduththu Vazhinadaththappattuth Thamaskuvukku Vandhen.
12 appozhudhu Vedhappiramaanaththinpadiye Bakthiyullavanum, Ange Kudiyirukkira Sagala Yoodharaalum Nallavanendru Saatchipetravanumaagiya Ananiyaa Ennum Oruvan,
13 ennidaththil Vandhunindru: Sagodharanaagiya Savule, Paarvaiyadaivaayaaga Endraan; Annerame Naan Paarvaiyadaindhu, Avanai Erittuppaarththen.
14 appozhudhu Avan: Nammudaiya Munnorgalin Dhevanudaiya Thiruvulaththai Nee Ariyavum, Needhibararaith Dharisikkavum, Avarudaiya Thiruvaaimozhiyaikketkavum, Avar Unnai Munname Therindhukondaar.
15 nee Kandavaigalaiyum Kettavaigalaiyum Kuriththuch Sagala Manusharukkumunbaaga Avarukkuch Saatchiyaayiruppaai.
16 ippozhudhu Nee Thaamadhikkiradhenna? Nee Ezhundhu Karththarudaiya Naamaththaith Thozhudhukondu, Gnaanasnaanampetru, Un Paavangal Pogak Kazhuvappadu Endraan.
17 pinbu Naan Erusalemukkuth Thirumbivandhu, Dhevaalayaththil Jebampannikkondirukkaiyil, Gnaanadhirushtiyadaindhu, Avaraith Dharisiththen.
18 avar Ennai Nokki: Nee Ennaikkuriththuch Sollum Saatchiyai Ivargal Etrukkollamaattaargal; Aadhalaal Nee Thaamadhampannaamal Seekkiramaai Erusalemaivittup Purappattuppo Endraar.
19 adharku Naan: Aandavare, Ummidaththil Visuvaasamaayirukkiravargalai Naan Kaavalil Vaiththu Jebaaalayangalile Adiththadhaiyum,

20 ummudaiya Saatchiyaagiya Sthevaanudaiya Raththam Sindhappadugirabodhu, Naanum Aruge Nindru, Avanaik Kolaiseyvadharkuch Sammadhiththu, Avanaik Kolaiseydhavargalin Vasthirangalaik Kaaththukkondirundhadhaiyum, Ivargal Arindhirukkiraargale Endren.
21 adharku Avar: Nee Po, Naan Unnaith Dhooramaaip Purajaadhigalidaththile Anuppuven Endru Sonnaar Endraan.
22 indha Vaarththaivaraikkum Avanukkuch Sevikoduththaargal. Pinbu: Ippadippattavanai Boomiyilirundhu Agatravendum, Ivan Uyirodirukkiradhu Niyaayamallavendru Migundha Saththamittuch Sonnaargal.
23 ivvidhamaai Avargal Kookkuralittuth Thangal Melvasthirangalai Erindhuvittu, Aagaayaththile Puzhudhiyaith Thootrikkondirukkaiyil,
24 senaabadhi Avanaik Kottaikkulle Konduvarumpadi Kattalaiyittu, Avargal Avanukku Virodhamaai Ippadik Kookkuralitta Mugaandharaththai Ariyumpadikku Avanaich Savukkaal Adiththu Visaarikkach Sonnaan.

25 andhappadi Avargal Avanai Vaarinaal Azhundhakkattumbodhu, Pavul Sameebamaai Nindra Nootrukku Adhibadhiyai Nokki: Romanum Niyaayam Visaarikkappadaadhavanumaayirukkira Manushanai Adikkiradhu Ungalukku Niyaayamaa Endraan.
26 nootrukku Adhibadhi Adhaikkettu Senaabadhiyinidaththirkup Poi, Adhai Ariviththu: Neer Seyyappogiradhaik Kuriththu Echcharikkaiyaayirum; Indha Manushan Roman Endraan.
27 appozhudhu Senaabadhi Pavulinidaththil Vandhu: Nee Romanaa? Enakkuch Sol Endraan. Adharku Avan: Naan Romandhaan Endraan.

28 senaabadhi Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Naan Migundha Thiraviyaththinaale Indhach Silaakkiyaththaich Sambaadhiththen Endraan. Adharkup Pavul: Naano Andhach Silaakkiyaththirkuriyavanaagap Pirandhen Endraan.
29 avanai Adiththu Visaarikkumpadi Eththanamaayirundhavargal Udane Avanai Vittuvittaargal. Senaabadhi Avan Romanendru Arindhu, Avanaik Kattuviththadharkaagap Bayandhaan.

30 pavulinmel Yoodharaale Erpaduththappatta Kutram Innadhendru Nichchayamaai Ariya Virumbi, Avan Marunaalile Avanaik Kattavizhththu, Piradhaana Aasaariyaraiyum Aalosanai Sangaththaar Anaivaraiyum Koodivarumpadi Kattalaiyittu, Avanaik Koottikkondupoi, Avargalukku Munbaaga Niruththinaan.
